replies.body: I need to go on a journey to find the Rusty Magic 8 ball, even if i have to travel the Black water and the seven Fishes i may need to bring an Atlus with me if i die. Don't worry i will re-Spawn.

So for those that want to know.

Rusty can't come last (Spawn with his picks will be the padding because the most he can gain on Rusty is 1 point)

Atlus is the outlier, and can have his point standing change dramatically (his looking at most either getting 5 points up on all the casters, or 5 points down due to backing AV and HLN and for the 2-0 for chiefs so he also has the most to lose.)

Fish has the same picks as Spawn, and already has his 1 point advantage.

Spawn and Atlus are the 2 casters that can possibly lose out here, and it could be by a 4 point margin depending on what happens.

(That said a tie is possible if Chief's go 2-1 and one of AV/HLN win)
Thanks for the math! I was far too lazy so I'm going to trust you on this one, don't go breaking my heart though :(
